statements: SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referral_date FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT referral_id, referred_to_facility FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_reason = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, specialist_id, referral_date FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referred_to_facility = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE specialist_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT specialist_id, referral_date, referral_reason FROM PatientReferrals WHERE patient_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765';
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_reason LIKE '%Orthopedics%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT MAX(referral_date) FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT MIN(referral_date) FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(referral_date, '2022-01-01')) FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT DISTINCT referred_to_facility FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT specialist_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(referral_date, '2022-01-01')) AS avg_referral_days FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY specialist_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT referred_to_facility, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY referred_to_facility HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT specialist_id, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_reason = 'Oncology' GROUP BY specialist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT patient_id, referral_date, LAG(referral_date) OVER (PARTITION BY patient_id ORDER BY referral_date) AS previous_referral_date FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(referral_date, LAG(referral_date) OVER (PARTITION BY specialist_id ORDER BY referral_date))) AS avg_days_between_referrals FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM PatientReferrals WHERE specialist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_reason LIKE '%consultation%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT DISTINCT referred_to_facility FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referral_date FROM PatientReferrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT specialist_id FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referred_to_facility = 'Hospital A';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), referral_date)) AS avg_days_since_referral FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients_referred FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT referral_id FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_reason IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_referrals, referred_to_facility FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY referred_to_facility ORDER BY total_referrals DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_date < '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, MIN(referral_date) AS first_referral_date FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT specialist_id, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY specialist_id ORDER BY total_referrals DESC;
SELECT referral_date, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY referral_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT referral_reason, COUNT(*) AS reason_count FROM PatientReferrals GROUP BY referral_reason ORDER BY reason_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND specialist_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND referral_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals;
SELECT * FROM specialist;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referred_to_facility, referral_date FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_id = 1;
SELECT specialist_id, specialist_name, specialty FROM specialist WHERE specialist_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, referred_to_facility FROM patient_referrals WHERE referred_to_facility = 'Hospital A';
SELECT specialist_name, specialty FROM specialist WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM specialist WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_referrals;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) FROM patient_referrals;
SELECT MAX(referral_date) FROM patient_referrals;
SELECT MIN(specialist_id) FROM specialist;
SELECT DISTINCT referred_to_facility FROM patient_referrals;
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT specialist_name, facility_id FROM specialist WHERE specialist_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT specialist_name, specialty FROM specialist;
SELECT patient_id, referral_date FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT AVG(specialist_id) FROM specialist;
SELECT referral_id, referred_to_facility FROM patient_referrals WHERE referred_to_facility <> 'Clinic B';
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_id = 1;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referred_to_facility FROM patient_referrals WHERE referral_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_referrals JOIN specialist ON patient_referrals.referred_to_facility = specialist.facility_id;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, specialty FROM patient_referrals JOIN specialist ON patient_referrals.referred_to_facility = specialist.facility_id WHERE specialist.specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT p.patient_id, s.specialist_name FROM patient_referrals p JOIN specialist s ON p.referred_to_facility = s.facility_id;
SELECT p.patient_id, s.specialty, s.facility_id FROM patient_referrals p JOIN specialist s ON p.referred_to_facility = s.facility_id WHERE s.specialty = 'Neurology';
SELECT p.patient_id, p.referral_date, s.specialty FROM patient_referrals p JOIN specialist s ON p.referred_to_facility = s.facility_id;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.referral_date, s.speci...
SELECT * FROM referrals;
SELECT referral_id, patient_id, referred_to_specialist, referral_date FROM referrals;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM specialists;
SELECT specialist_id, full_name, specialization FROM specialists;

SELECT referrals.referral_id, referrals.patient_id, referrals.referred_to_specialist, patients.full_name AS patient_name, specialists.full_name AS specialist_name FROM referrals INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON referrals.referred_to_specialist = specialists.specialization;

SELECT referrals.patient_id, patients.full_name AS patient_name, patients.age, patients.gender, referrals.referred_to_specialist, specialists.full_name AS specialist_name, specialists.specialization FROM referrals INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON referrals.referred_to_specialist = specialists.specialization;

SELECT referrals.referral_id, referrals.referral_date, patients.full_name AS patient_name, specialists.full_name AS specialist_name FROM referrals INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON referrals.referred_to_specialist = specialists.specialization;

SELECT referrals.referral_id, referrals.patient_id, patients.full_name AS patient_name, referrals.referred_to_specialist, specialists.specialization FROM referrals INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON referrals.referred_to_specialist = specialists.specialization;

SELECT referrals.referral_id, referrals.patient_id, patients.full_name AS patient_name, patients.age, patients.gender, referrals.referred_to_specialist, specialists.specialization, specialists.full_name AS specialist_name FROM referrals INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON referrals.referred_to_specialist = specialists.specialization;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referred_to_specialist = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referred_to_specialist = 'Orthopedics';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' AND referral_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' AND referral_date < '2022-03-01' AND referred_to_specialist = 'Dermatology';
SELECT COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM referrals;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM referrals;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' AND referral_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT r.referral_id, r.patient_id, p.full_name, s.specialization FROM referrals r JOIN patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name;
SELECT * FROM specialists WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' OR specialization = 'Neurology';
SELECT p.full_name, p.age, s.full_name, s.specialization FROM patients p LEFT JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id LEFT JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_referrals, p.gender FROM referrals r JOIN patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY p.gender;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM specialists;
SELECT p.full_name, p.age, r.referral_date FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.patient_id) AS total_patients, s.specialization FROM referrals r JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name GROUP BY s.specialization;
SELECT r1.referral_id, r1.patient_id, r1.referral_date FROM referrals r1 JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-06-01') r2 ON r1.patient_id = r2.patient_id;

SELECT r.referral_id, p.full_name AS patient_name, s.full_name AS specialist_name FROM referrals r JOIN patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name ORDER BY r.referral_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_id IN (SELECT referral_id FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-09-01');

SELECT p.full_name, p.age, r.referral_date FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.referred_to_specialist IN (SELECT full_name FROM specialists WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology');

SELECT r1.referral_id, r1.patient_id, r1.referral_date FROM referrals r1 JOIN referrals r2 ON r1.patient_id = r2.patient_id AND r1.referral_date < r2.referral_date WHERE r2.referral_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT p.full_name AS patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY p.full_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_specialists, specialization FROM specialists GROUP BY specialization HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.full_name AS patient_name, AVG(r.referral_date) AS avg_referral_date FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY p.full_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT p.full_name, p.age, s.specialization FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name ORDER BY p.age;
SELECT s.specialization, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM referrals r JOIN specialists s ON r.referred_to_specialist = s.full_name GROUP BY s.specialization HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT p.full_name, r.referral_date FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.referred_to_specialist IN (SELECT full_name FROM specialists WHERE specialization = 'Neurology');
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_date = (SELECT MAX(referral_date) FROM referrals);
SELECT p.full_name, p.gender, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM patients p JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY p.full_name, p.gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients
SELECT specialist_name, specialist_area FROM specialists
SELECT * FROM referrals
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM healthcare_facilities
SELECT patient_name, specialist_name, referral_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists s ON r.specialist_id = s.specialist_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.specialist_name, r.referral_date, f.facility_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists s ON r.specialist_id = s.specialist_id INNER JOIN healthcare_facilities f ON r.facility_id = f.facility_id
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT * FROM specialists WHERE specialist_area = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age ASC
SELECT specialist_name, specialist_area FROM specialists ORDER BY specialist_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients
SELECT AVG(patient_age) FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM patients p INNER JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM healthcare_facilities f INNER JOIN referrals r ON f.facility_id = r.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM patients p INNER JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT s.specialist_name, COUNT(*) AS referral_count FROM specialists s INNER JOIN referrals r ON s.specialist_id = r.specialist_id GROUP BY s.specialist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT specialist_area FROM specialists

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, referral_date, CASE WHEN referral_date < '2022-01-01' THEN 'Old Referral' ELSE 'New Referral' END AS referral_status FROM patients p INNER JOIN referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients UNION SELECT * FROM specialists
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name,patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM specialists WHERE specialist_area = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name,specialist_name FROM patients INNER JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id INNER JOIN specialists ON specialists.specialist_id = referrals.specialist_id;
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM referrals GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_referrals > 2;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_facilities LEFT JOIN referrals ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = referrals.specialist_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT patient_name,referral_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id;
SELECT specialist_name, COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM specialists INNER JOIN referrals ON specialists.specialist_id = referrals.specialist_id GROUP BY specialist_name;

SELECT patient_name,facility_name FROM patients LEFT JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id LEFT JOIN healthcare_facilities ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = referrals.specialist_id;

SELECT specialist_area, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_patient_age FROM specialists INNER JOIN referrals ON specialists.specialist_id = referrals.specialist_id INNER JOIN patients ON referrals.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY specialist_area;
SELECT patient_name,referral_date FROM patients RIGHT JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name FROM healthcare_facilities INNER JOIN referrals ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = referrals.specialist_id;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM patients LEFT JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;

SELECT specialist_name,facility_location FROM specialists INNER JOIN referrals ON specialists.specialist_id = referrals.specialist_id INNER JOIN healthcare_facilities ON referrals.specialist_id = healthcare_facilities.facility_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(DISTINCT specialist_id) AS total_specialists FROM healthcare_facilities INNER JOIN referrals ON healthcare_facilities.facility_id = referrals.specialist_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM referrals;
SELECT patient_name,referral_date FROM patients FULL JOIN referrals ON patients.patient_id = referrals.patient_id;
SELECT MAX(patient_age) AS max_age, MIN(patient_age) AS min_age FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities FROM healthcare_facilities;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Referrals;
SELECT specialist_name, referred_date FROM Referrals;
SELECT * FROM Specialists;
SELECT specialist_name, specialist_field FROM Specialists;
SELECT * FROM Facilities;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM Facilities;
SELECT * FROM PatientReferrals;
SELECT patient_id, referral_id FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_status = 'Pending';
SELECT patient_id, referral_id, referred_to FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referral_status = 'Accepted';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Referrals.specialist_name FROM Patients JOIN Referrals ON Patients.patient_id = Referrals.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, referral_reason FROM Patients JOIN Referrals ON Patients.patient_id = Referrals.patient_id WHERE Referrals.specialist_name = 'Cardiologist';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Specialists.specialist_name FROM Patients JOIN Specialists ON Patients.patient_name = Specialists.specialist_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM Facilities WHERE facility_location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_id, referral_id, referred_to FROM PatientReferrals WHERE referred_to = '1234';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, referral_status FROM Patients JOIN PatientReferrals ON Patients.patient_id = PatientReferrals.patient_id WHERE referral_status = 'Accepted';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Referrals WHERE referral_reason LIKE 'Cardiology%';
SELECT r.referred_date, p.patient_name, s.specialist_name FROM Referrals r INNER JOIN Patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN Specialists s ON r.specialist_name = s.specialist_name;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location FROM Facilities WHERE facility_location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, referral_reason FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.referral_reason LIKE '%Check-up%';

SELECT p.patient_name, r.referral_reason, s.specialist_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id INNER JOIN Specialists s ON r.specialist_name = s.specialist_name WHERE s.specialist_field = 'Cardiology';
SELECT AVG(patient_age) FROM Patients;
SELECT DISTINCT s.specialist_field FROM Specialists s INNER JOIN Referrals r ON s.specialist_name = r.specialist_name;

SELECT p.patient_name, r.referral_reason, f.facility_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN Referrals r ON pr.referral_id = r.referral_id INNER JOIN Facilities f ON pr.referred_to = f.facility_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients p INNER JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN Referrals r ON pr.referral_id = r.referral_id WHERE r.referred_date >= '2022-01-01' AND r.referred_date <= '2022-02-01';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.patient_id) FROM Patients p INNER JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN Referrals r ON pr.referral_id = r.referral_id WHERE r.referral_status = 'Completed';
SELECT patient_name, referral_reason, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Referrals r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, referral_reason;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(pr.referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT s.specialist_name, COUNT(r.referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM Specialists s LEFT JOIN Referrals r ON s.specialist_name = r.specialist_name GROUP BY s.specialist_name;
SELECT patient_name, COALESCE(patient_age, 'N/A') AS age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, COALESCE(patient_age, 'N/A') AS age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, CASE WHEN patient_age < 18 THEN 'Minor' ELSE 'Adult' END AS age_group FROM Patients;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(pr.referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name HAVING total_referrals > 1;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, COUNT(pr.referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender HAVING total_referrals > 0;

SELECT p.patient_name, r.referral_reason, s.specialist_field FROM Patients p INNER JOIN PatientReferrals pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id INNER JOIN Referrals r ON pr.referral_id = r.referral_id INNER JOIN Specialists s ON r.specialist_name = s.specialist_name WHERE r.referred_date >= '2022-01-01' AND r.referred_date <= '2022-02-01';
